events.event_name: One day training on Localization and Translation
events.event_description: This event aims create awareness among attendees about the need for localization and how anyone, even without any technical knowledge can contribute very easily to the community by localization. This event will help to get new contributors to l10n community.

events.event_name: One day Tamil l10n training & Tech Sprint
events.event_description: This event aims to create awareness among attendees about the need for localization and how anyone, even without any technical knowledge can contribute very easily to the community by localization. This event will help to get new contributors to the community.
Introduction to Firefox OS app development, setting up simulator and WebIDE discussion.
SUMO is short form for Support Mozilla
Documentation projects like Mozilla developer Network and blogging will be discussed
We will be learning more about localization events.
